name: SubMarie
description:
We made this game for the Mini Jam 109: Depths with the limitation: Health is a tool.

In this game you use your oxygen to navigate a submarine. You do this by putting holes in it. If you make too many or too few the oxygen will run out, before you can make it to the surface. Try it it write your best hole-score in the comments.

Beware the fishes.

This game was made with a team of 4 people.
Design by Svenson.
Programming by Julian an me.
Music and Sound Design by Peleg Bahat.

It was a lot of fun. We hope you like the game.
